ModMetaData.name: LED Lamps (B19)
ModMetaData.author: Fr33
ModMetaData.description:
Its the future, so why do lights still use so much power? This Mod adds the ability to research and build standing lamps with LED Bulbs.
LED Lamps only use only 10 watts. Slightly more durable 60 hp vs. basic lamp of 50 hp. Light color is more of a natual white light. Only 3kg vs 4kg Way less chance of casuing fire.
Requires:
10 steel and 1 component 400 Research on Electricity tree 50% increase build time over base lamp (5 vs 7.5 units) 6 Construction Required
